title: RSS Feed for a file that does not exist results in 500 internal server error
body:
### Description

_No response_

### Gitea Version

1.24.3

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

Empty repo: https://gitea.com/eliroca/empty

RSS feed for a file that does not exist: https://gitea.com/eliroca/empty/rss/branch/main/README.md


### Log Gist

```
Jul 22 15:13:43 gitea gitea[1053]: 2025/07/22 15:13:43 HTTPRequest [W] router: failed    GET /pool/000package-repos/rss/branch/main/README.md for [2a01:4a0:11::2]:63402, panic in 43.3ms @ feed/render.go:11(feed.RenderBranchFeed), err=runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
```
